| History                 = The Vladivostok Mafia was a criminal organization that operated in [[Madripoor]]. Their criminal activities included illegal transactions, drugs, brothels, and video piracy. They also had dealings with the [[Jade Dragon Triad (Earth-616)|Jade Dragon Triad]].<!-- {{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 1}} -->

Two members of the organization, the [[Karamazov Brothers (Earth-616)|Karamazov Brothers]], bought the legs and body of the android [[Elsie-Dee (Earth-616)|Elsie-Dee]] from [[Donald Pierce (Earth-616)|Donald Pierce]] for cheap. They then put a Japanese schoolgirl uniform on the robotic body and planned to have it serve drinks to customers at [[Club Azimut]], an establishment ran by their organization.<!-- {{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 1}} -->

Elsie-Dee and her partner [[Albert (Earth-616)|Albert]] later appeared at Club Azimut to retrieve Elsie-Dee's body. Albert took out the gang members at the club, including the Karamazov Brothers, and put Elsie-Dee back together. The Vladivostok Mafia later organized to get revenge on Albert and Elsie-Dee.{{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 1}}

The confrontation with the androids went badly for the gang as Albert and Elsie-Dee were able to escape while killing many of their members, including the Karamazov Brothers.{{r|2020 iWolverine Vol 1 2}}
